attributes.action: Make period products free across the UK
attributes.additional_details: As a woman in the UK, I feel that I shouldn't have to pay £5 a month on products that should be free in this country. It is a biological process that causes pain and heavy bleeding, and there are people out there who can't afford these essential items for women. Please make these products free, for our quality of life, and to end period poverty.
attributes.background: Please make period products free for women across the UK, period poverty is a real issue in this country, and I believe that women shouldn't have to pay for these items that are essential in our lives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Fund free period pads
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733282

Fund free menstrual products and access to drinking water in public
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734030
